name: Muju Tree Spirit Sculpture
blurb: This handmade Muju Tree Spirit sculpture will be reproduced as a limited edition bio-resin art toy.

name: The Nalu Muju
blurb: Inspired by a love of the ocean, this handmade sculpture by Muju Studio  celebrates the beauty of waves.

name: Blown Glass Space Art Exhibit (and you get some art!!)
blurb: An exhibit of blown glass, carved glass and paintings of the beauty of outer space at the upcoming National Space Symposium.

name: Origami Studio NY
blurb: Support the creation of an Origami Studio. Origami: The art of transforming a single sheet of paper into a complex form by only folding

name: Exhibition of Blown Glass Art
blurb: An exhibition of blown and carved glass art and paintings showcasing the beauty of space.

name: Creepy Hill: BOBBY - Collectible Toy Figure
blurb: Bobby is the first creature from the world of Creepy Hill produced as a pre-painted resin figure.

name: Unbearable – Polar bear impaled by CO2Graph in Paris.
blurb: Sculptural outcry – real size copper polar bear will stage the climate catastrophe and make Obama & world leaders act!

name: Lady of Innsmouth - An original Lovecraft Mythos Sculpture
blurb: Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft's 'The Shadow Over Innsmouth'. This sculpture will be cast in high quality resin and cold cast bronze.

name: Lethal Taco : A Mexican Toy Masterpiece
blurb: Lethal Taco is a designer art toy creation designed by Oscar Mar x David Dick and produced by Mindzai Labs.

name: Gravy Toys Let's Make Lonny
blurb:
From sketch to kaiju.
The Suns of Brodarr art toys.
Get your Lonny now!
Yes, it's a little haiku from Lonny to you.

name: Meridional Overturning Circulation - Art / Oceans / Climate
blurb: Global ocean circulation as kinetic art. Science facilitates knowledge of the Earth’s climate, and art facilitates perspective.

name: D.I.Y. Lovebot Toy - Join the Love Invasion!
blurb: D.I.Y. Lovebot is a designer toy created by Matthew Del Degan x Mindzai

name: Happy Dragons! Whimsical Dragon Sculptures by Nina Bolen
blurb: Happy Dragons! Whimsical Dragon Sculptures. Help me create a full line of cute collectable dragon figurines.

name: Noble Savages: An Artist Book on Hemp Sculptures
blurb: A unique artist book documenting the context, process and craft behind a series of hemp sculptures called Noble Savages.

name: WHEEL OF FORTUNE - Burning Man 2014
blurb: Wheel of Fortune is an interactive installation & divination tool featuring the 22 Major Arcana cards of the Tarot and BRC Honorarium

name: NFCeye Transmedia Sculpture
blurb: NFCeye is a transmedia sculpture that captures & shares memories about the Fukushima accident in the form of photos, videos, & songs.

name: Signal Fire Residency: Unwalking Lewis and Clark
blurb: Artists are in tents! I am backpacking Lewis and Clark's westward expedition in reverse. Help fund my residency fees and travel!

name: Treasure in Earthen Vessels
blurb: Celebrate Life's lovely fragility--organic bark shell of a natural tree painted with ethereal faces, assemblage with sculpted roots.

name: Muju Star Traveller Sculpture
blurb:
Help launch the new sculpture from Muju Studio. 
A handmade resin figure inspired by intergalactic space travel.

name: Celtic Art: Sculpture and Journey
blurb: RI Stonecarver inspired by Celtic art to visit British Museum's landmark "Celts: Art and Identity", create new work, mount gallery show

name: Sisyphus – The Kinetic Art Table
blurb: What music brings to your ears, Sisyphus brings to your eyes. Kinetic art, technology and design merged in stunning meditative beauty.

name: Fine Art Sculpture (Brighton): Our Degree Show 2017
blurb: We need funds in order to give the best ever degree show possible! Your money helps us buy materials like paint and wood for building.

name: Watchful Eyes and Monster Taxidermy for the Adventurous Home
blurb: The launch of the make/100 has inspired me to create two new unique creature curations limited to 100 pieces each.

name: Little Foxes
blurb: A project to make 100 unique fox figures from reclaimed wood.

name: Majestic Wire Tree Sculptures By Andy Elliott
blurb: Hand made sculptures using strands of wire

name: Heaven Sent sculpture
blurb: Heaven Sent is the pinnacle sculpture in a long series of emotive artwork.This hugely ambitious sculpture needs to be finished.

name: A beautiful statue : 'Jesus on the cross'
